item.title: Top 9 Foods That Keep Uterus Healthy
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: In a woman’s body, the uterus is a vital organ. It forms the basis of a woman’s reproductive system and plays a pivotal role in the foundation of life. Therefore, every woman must consume food for a healthy uterus. There are a great variety of readily available and nutritious foods that enhance uterine health. When… Read More »Top 9 Foods That Keep Uterus Healthy

item.title: 11 Reasons To Eat Watermelon During Pregnancy
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Pregnancy is a difficult stage in a woman’s life. However, eating a well-balanced diet rich in fruits promotes a healthy pregnancy and alleviates other symptoms such as morning sickness. Eating watermelon during pregnancy is gaining popularity. This delightful fruit is safe for pregnant women to eat because it is high in nutrients. Learn more about… Read More »11 Reasons To Eat Watermelon During Pregnancy

item.title: Limit These 10 High Saturated Fat Foods
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Saturated fat-rich foods are harmful to our health. Excess saturated fat consumption can lead to heart disease and stroke. According to the World Health Organization, coronary heart disease and stroke kill more than 14.1 million people each year. You should not, however, completely avoid saturated fats.  According to the American Heart Association, saturated fats should… Read More »Limit These 10 High Saturated Fat Foods

item.title: Top 20 Foods That Boost Metabolism
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: It’s normal to gain weight, especially if you work at a desk and don’t get any exercise. However, if you want to lose a few pounds, you can eat meals that accelerate your metabolism. Sedentary behavior inhibits metabolism. As a result, you acquire weight. But don’t worry, you won’t have to go hungry or sweat… Read More »Top 20 Foods That Boost Metabolism

item.title: Top 10 Alternatives To Peanut Butter
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: If you’re allergic to (or just tired of) peanut butter, there are lots of alternative nut butter to select from. Every spoonful of peanut butter provides a healthy amount of protein, healthy fats, and fiber, as well as a smooth, creamy texture that adds comfort to any snack or meal.  However, there are a variety… Read More »Top 10 Alternatives To Peanut Butter
